ContentIndexDelete.summary:
The delete() method of the
interface unregisters an item from the currently indexed
content.

blockquote.para:
Note: Calling delete() only affects the index. It does not delete anything
from the .

remarks.para:
-An introductory article on the Content Index API
-An app which uses the Content Index API to list and remove 'save for later' content
-Service Worker API, along with information about Cache and CacheStorage

ContentIndexDelete.returns: Returns a that resolves with undefined
